mapper.select: SELECT a.userid, a.username, a.password, a.usertype, a.mobile, a.email, a.baseinfoid, a.isblacklist, a.name, a.aae013 FROM v_s_user a WHERE (a.username = #{username} OR a.mobile = #{username}) AND a.password=#{password} AND a.enabled = '1'
SELECT b.rolecode as rolecode FROM s_user a, s_role b, s_user_role c WHERE ( a.username = #{username} OR a.mobile = #{username}) AND a.userid = c.userid AND b.roleid = c.roleid

SELECT DISTINCT d.permcode as permcode FROM s_user a, s_role b, s_user_role c, s_permission d, s_role_permission e WHERE ( a.username = #{username} OR a.mobile = #{username}) AND a.userid = c.userid AND b.roleid = c.roleid AND b.roleid = e.roleid AND d.permissionid = e.permissionid UNION SELECT DISTINCT c.permcode as permcode FROM s_user a, s_user_permission b, s_permission c WHERE (a.username = #{username} OR a.mobile = #{username}) AND a.userid = b.userid AND c.permissionid = b.permissionid
